geninfo.para: This engine is designed and built without exhaust manifold gaskets. As a result, trace amounts of soot may collect under each exhaust manifold port where the manifold contacts the cylinder head. Some bus inspectors may flag this as a condition to be corrected.

svcproc.title: Servicing the Engine
svcproc.para: To modify existing condition, obtain P/N 1855240C1 exhaust manifold gaskets (2). Refer to the VT 365 Engine Service Manual EGES-235-1 or EGES-295 for procedures regarding removal and installation of both exhaust manifolds.
